snippet: A plan for luxury towers at the old Domino Sugar refinery in Brooklyn may signal a final goodbye to the gritty neighborhood some residents once knew.
abstract: Plan for luxury towers at old Domino Sugar refinery in Brooklyn, built in 1880s and given landmark status before its closing in 2004, may signal final goodbye to gritty Williamsburg neighborhood some residents once knew; opposition to planned development is waning, as sense of resignation sets in.
lead_paragraph: A plan for luxury towers at the old Domino Sugar refinery in Brooklyn may signal a final goodbye to the gritty neighborhood some residents once knew.

headline.main: At Brooklyn’s Domino Sugar Site, Waning Opposition to Prospect of Luxury Towers
headline.print_headline: At Brooklyn’s Domino Sugar Site, Waning Opposition to Prospect of Luxury Towers
